Creation data sets file¶

creation_data_sets.convert(dir_path, table, dataset, quality, test_case)¶

Create the images dataset with the given parameters. Note: Cifar dataset is converted to grey scale images.

Parameters

  • dir_path – The directory in which the dataset will be created.

  • table – The images pixel dataset.

  • dataset – Choosen dataset 0 for Mnist and 1 for Cifar-10.

  • quality – Choosent JPEG quality between 100, 90, 80, 70 and 60.

  • test_case – Can be set to true in order to create only the 20 first images of the datasets.

Returns

Nothing

creation_data_sets.create_directories(train_path, test_path)¶

Create the directories in which train and test datasets will be stored.

Parameters

  • train_path – The directory in which the train dataset will be stored.

  • test_path – The directory in which the test dataset will be stored.

Returns

Nothing

creation_data_sets.creation_data_sets(quality, dataset, test_case=False)¶

Thanks to parameters create the associated JPEG compressed dataset.

Parameters

  • quality – Choosent JPEG quality between 100, 90, 80, 70 and 60.

  • dataset – Choosen dataset 0 for Mnist and 1 for Cifar-10.

  • test_case – Can be set to true in order to create only the 20 first images of the datasets.

Returns

Nothing
